citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:40am on 30
MARCH 2023. Contact was made with a family member at the residence of the facility. They did not expect the licensee
to be home for 3-4 hours and they were unable to accompany me through the facility due to age limitations.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:40am on 30 
MARCH 2023. Contact was made with a family member at the residence of the facility. They did not expect the licensee 
to be home for 3-4 hours and they were unable to accompany me through the facility due to age limitations. 
 
 
 
End Section
